img_above_text:
Go out here and toward the statues to collect the Amber Prayer Beads curio from the box.
Amber Prayer Beads
img_below_text:
Go back inside the cave and now turn right to collect the green Wisp. Take out the Revenant near it, then go forward.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark cave environment with intricately carved demonic faces on the walls. A player character, equipped with detailed armor and a staff-like weapon, approaches a glowing green Wisp highlighted by a red marker. In the distance, an enemy (likely the Revenant mentioned in the text) is seen kneeling or preparing to engage. The scene aligns with the guide's instructions to collect the Wisp and defeat the nearby enemy.
